summary: Sameer, fast at losing his temper is re-located to Goa where he falls in love with Rani. But Sameer's new roommate Sunny, has some plans of his own.
cast: Salman Khan|Akshay Kumar|Priyanka Chopra|Amrish Puri|Rajpal Yadav|Satish Shah|Supriya Karnik|Kader Khan|Rekha Rao|Shashikala|Upasna Singh|Amrita Arora|Dinyar Contractor|Parth Dave|Kurush Deboo|Kapil Dev|Mushtaq Khan|Prasoon Narayan|Shefali Zariwala|Mohammad Kaif|Ashish Nehra|Parthiv Ajay Patel|Irfan Pathan|Navjot Singh Sidhu|Harbhajan Singh|Javagal Srinath
title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
